scripts.compile: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build/katozu-5e && node scripts/compile.js && cp -r src/assets build/katozu-5e/assets && cp src/module.json build/katozu-5e/module.json && cp README.md build/katozu-5e/README.md
scripts.pack: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist && (cd build/katozu-5e; zip -r ../../dist/katozu-5e.zip *) && cp build/katozu-5e/module.json dist/module.json
